physical_examinations.vital_signs: Length 48 cm (-1.22 SDS), Weight 2,920 g (-1.02 SDS)
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: The external genitalia showed a rugated labia majora, no palpable gonads, genital tubercle of 1.5 cm with proximal urethral opening, considered as Prader type 3 ambiguous genitalia.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: At three months, clitoris hypertrophy had regressed. Initial (7 days of age) 17-OH-P and testosterone were elevated and progressively diminished; testosterone reached normal female levels from the 1st month, whereas 17-OH-P was still slightly elevated at seven months.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: No signs of adrenarche (no pubic hair), and bone age was 7 years.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The patient developed without any further significant clinical manifestations, indicating stability in growth and hormonal patterns.
